entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@Mike_Pence @VP @WhiteHouse Trump once again sought to deepen racial & cultural divisions in America rather than attempting to unify a country during twin crises of the coronavirus pandemic & a sweeping reckoning on racism.

Stay safe & Vote Blue
Biden
